revision.text: {{also|Yau|þau}} ==Japanese== ===Romanization=== {{ja-romaji}} # {{ja-romanization of|やう}} ---- ==Laboya== ===Etymology=== From {{inh|lmy|poz-pro|*i-kahu}}, from {{inh|lmy|map-pro|*kaSu}}. Compare {{cog|id|engkau}}. ===Pronoun=== {{head|lmy|pronoun}} # [[you]] (singular) ===References=== * {{r:lmy:rina|page=103}} ---- ==Mbyá Guaraní== ===Noun=== {{head|gun|noun}} # [[moss]] ---- ==San Miguel el Grande Mixtec== ===Etymology=== From {{inh|mig|omq-mxt-pro|*yawiʔ}}. ===Noun=== {{head|mig|noun}} # [[agave]] ====Derived terms==== {{col3|mig |yau tɨ́cunchī }} ===References=== * {{R:Dyk & Stoudt 1973|pages=52, 93}} ---- ==Tok Pisin== ===Noun=== {{head|tpi|noun}} # {{lb|tpi|anatomy}} [[ear]] ====Synonyms==== * {{l|tpi|ia}} ---- ==Yosondúa Mixtec== ===Etymology 1=== From {{inh|mpm|omq-mxt-pro|*yáwì}}. ====Noun==== {{head|mpm|noun}} # [[hole]] # [[cave]] ===Etymology 2=== From {{inh|mpm|omq-mxt-pro|*yawiʔ}}. ====Noun==== {{head|mpm|noun}} # [[maguey]] ===References=== * {{R:Farris et al. 2012|page=91}}
